name: SpiceCat
description:
SpiceCat is a VimJam3 game where you are  a cat that has to sabotage a restaurant by adding peppers into their pots and "Turning Up The Heat".

A dog restaurant has opened right next to the cat restaurant and they're stealing away all the customers.

What do you do? You Turn Up The Heat!

WebGL version may have some unchecked bugs due to time constraints but the downloadable versions are all good.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • Click and hold on a pot to add a pepper
  • Click on a vent or bin to hide in it
  • Click on a vent or bin again or press the escape key to exit it  
  • Escape key to pause
